name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior FullStack Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I specialize in developing scalable software solutions using **Python**, **FastAPI**, **Flask**, and **ReactJs**. My expertise in **RESTful** services and databases including **SQL** and **NoSQL** has enabled me to lead impactful projects that enhance user experience and performance. I am proficient in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and cloud platforms like **Google Cloud**, **AWS**, and **Azure**, ensuring efficient deployment and scalability through **CI/CD** and **DevOps** practices. I excel in mentoring junior engineers and fostering collaboration across cross-functional teams while maintaining clear and effective communication. My commitment to enhancing accessibility and driving technical excellence is at the forefront of all my endeavors.
